name: Order matters
summary:
Go through the world of 'Order Matters', solve puzzles and riddles. Use interactable 
objects, avoid traps, enter magical gateways - everything to get to the portal 
which will teleports you to the next level. Every level requires different 
approach to occuring problems and has unique artwork. Remember, the order of your 
actions is crucial to succeed the level. Some of the worlds hide magical artifacts, 
which requires different way of completing level.

Features:

- Many unrepeatable riddles on various levels
- Whole game made in Pixel Art
- 30 unique levels
- 12 hidden artifacts waiting for the player
- 12 available characters
